notes: Seeded SGIP snapshot v0. Deterministic fixture-pack seed for unit tests and offline economics. Not a live program feed; budget availability/step-down timing not modeled.

eligibility.notes: Eligibility is not inferred in v0; caller must pass eligible=true and category.

budgetAvailability.notes: Budget exhaustion and step-downs are not modeled in v0.

general_market.notes: Seed rate ($/Wh). Caps/adders not exhaustively modeled in v0.

equity_resiliency.notes: Seed rate ($/Wh). Caps/adders not exhaustively modeled in v0.

equity.notes: Seed rate ($/Wh). Caps/adders not exhaustively modeled in v0.

residential.notes: Present for completeness; v0 calculators do not apply residential unless explicitly selected.
